channel.title: Comments on: Upcoming webinar – MySQL performance tuning best practices
channel.description: Database technologies - especially around scalability and High Availability

item.title: By: admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/mysql-cluster/upcoming-webinar-mysql-performance-tuning-best-practices#comment-377">Thanh-Liem</a>.
Hi Than Liem,
yes, the web seminar will be recorded and I'll post the link when it's available.
Alternatively, there's already a recording from the previous webcast where the same material was cast. You can get that from http://www.mysql.com/news-and-events/on-demand-webinars/display-od-453.html
Regards, Andrew.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Thanh-Liem.

Hi Than Liem,

yes, the web seminar will be recorded and I’ll post the link when it’s available.

Alternatively, there’s already a recording from the previous webcast where the same material was cast. You can get that from http://www.mysql.com/news-and-events/on-demand-webinars/display-od-453.html

Regards, Andrew.

item.title: By: Thanh-Liem
item.dc:creator: Thanh-Liem
item.description:
Hello,
I am wondering if the Upcoming web seminar will be recorded or accessible somehow during another period of time. The reason is because I am actually in Montreal, Quebec Canada and the timeframe proposed (Tuesday, February 2, 2009: 10:00 CET (Central European Time)/ 09:00 UK/GMT) is not very assessible for us in montreal. It will be, if I don't mistaken, around 4 AM in the morning.
If you can help me, by providing a copy of the recored of the seminar, it will be appreciated.
Thank you.
item.content:encoded:
Hello,

I am wondering if the Upcoming web seminar will be recorded or accessible somehow during another period of time. The reason is because I am actually in Montreal, Quebec Canada and the timeframe proposed (Tuesday, February 2, 2009: 10:00 CET (Central European Time)/ 09:00 UK/GMT) is not very assessible for us in montreal. It will be, if I don’t mistaken, around 4 AM in the morning.

If you can help me, by providing a copy of the recored of the seminar, it will be appreciated.

Thank you.
